FuncDef: The reset ospfv3 redistribution command re-imports OSPFv3 routes.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of an OSPFv3 process. If this parameter is not specified, OSPFv3 routes are re-imported in all OSPFv3 processes.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Re-imports OSPFv3 routes in all OSPFv3 processes.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To re-import OSPFv3 routes, run the reset ospfv3 redistribution command.
